Key Match Events: Rodrigo Bentancur scored in the 8th minute.
Ismaël Koné scored in the 22nd minute.
Jonathan David scored in the 80th minute.
Luis Suárez scored in the 90'+2 minute.
Alphonso Davies missed a penalty in the shootout.
Post-Match Reflections: Uruguay manager criticized Copa América organizers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte, North Carolina.
